reviews.review_msg: Hooray, he's gone! Has to be one of the worst profs ever. Arrogant, unclear in what he wants for projects and extravagant expectations for 2nd/3rd year. Save yourself the pain, take another class -- if you can, with SFU's reg system!
He thinks he is god's gift to students. Extremely difficult to recieve a good mark in tutorial participation. I would never recommend taking this professor if you want to maintain a good GPA.
Horrible experience.. participation mark totally unfair
Horrible teacher. Expects way to much from class. Worst experience in SFU.
A very mean man, not interested in anything any student has to say.  Seems to think he is hot stuff.
He thinks he is ALWAYS right.
Iwould suggest NOT taking anything with him. Not a nice guy.
He was clear, and a pretty funny guy, but he was a hard marker and seemed to only mark you well if you agreed with him. To get an A you have to devote all your time to his course.
In three years, he is by far the worst professor I have ever even heard of; and I am even horrfiied that he is even a sessional professor!!!!!!!!!!

If you are thinking of taking a class with this professor take my advice... Don't do it! Reconsider if you want to actually get something out of the classes you are taking. He's the most uninteresting professor at this university.  He should stick to being a historian and never teach again!

why do some historians become teachers? this is the question i asked myself while trying to endure this class, worse prof i have had at SFU he changed his essay topic everytime you asked him and the topic was very unclear, then marked it very hard and was extremly rude about it, Little has not heard of constructive criticism, dry lectures, painful

This is the worst prof I have ever had.He changed the essay topic two days before it was due.There is a huge difference between constructive criticism and just plain rude & opinionated critism.I do not recommend this prof.Avoid at all costs.I was warned about this prof & didn't listen:(

Nice guy, but absolutely brutal lecturer!  Bring yourself some coffee, redbull...whatever it takes to stay away and follow!  When you write a paper make sure you know exactly what he wants to hear because your opinion doesn't count, and will actually hinder your mark.  BRUTAL!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Worst prof I've ever had.  It's terribly disturbing that he's the department head.  Brutal assignments, useless readings, and he often goes out of his way to insult the class, embarassing students who do poorly.  A disaster!
an expert in his field...but class way too boring
